name: Histogram
author: Daniel Neves
source:
$@input x, expression, "rnorm(100)", description = "vector of values for which the histogram is desired"

$@page Plot Options

$@input breaks, multi, default = "choices",
    inputs = list(
        numeric = list(default = 30), 
        choices = list(default = "Sturges", choices = c("Sturges", "Scott", "FD")))

$@group g2, layout = "flow-2", description = "Labels for the plot"

  $@input main, character, description = "main title for the plot."
  $@input xlab, character, description = "label for the x-axis."
  $@input ylab, character, description = "label for the y-axis."

  $@group g3, layout = "flow-2", description = "Limits for the axes"

  $@input xlim, numeric2, allow.null = TRUE, description = "x limits (x1, x2) for the plot."
  $@input ylim, numeric2, allow.null = TRUE, description = "y limits (y1, y2) for the plot."


$@output Plot, plot

hist(${dn:: D:x, breaks=breaks, main=main, xlab=xlab, ylab=ylab})
